ygData.subject: RE: shadowmen?
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe i thought the globe was the worst.  I camped for 3 hours just to get 3 globes for myself and 2 other necros, but it was a pain in the butt breaking into
ygData.messageBody:
hehe i thought the globe was the worst. I camped for 3 hours just to get 3
globes for myself and 2 other necros, but it was a pain in the butt breaking
into the area since it was just me and another necro (i was 30 he was 32)
when the task began. We were finally able to get a high level nec to come
in and break the spawn for us and he left and another nec joined in.

I just hung around unrest and asked if i could loot the items i needed for
the quest, matter of fact, there was a high level nec in there killing
fungus, and was shouting that anyone could loot the eyes. The werebat was a
piece of cake.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Muller [mailto:markm@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 10:37 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] shadowmen?


From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>

In nek, the scythe was easy :) it was the mortuary fungus that was a
pain...much more difficult than the globe for the robe in guk.


> Where were you hunting the shadowmen at? I hunted in nek and I would get
> about 3 to 4 scythes a night, and everything else was hard to find, but I
> did find it all and I must say I look like a bad ass dressed in all black
> running around with a scythe in 1 hand and dirk in the other :)

This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
